column1: Uchi////Almost as soon as he left
column2: we started getting dishes right and left.  We kept looking back at the menu
column3: trying to figure out what each one was called.  Everything was fantastic- we couldn't get over the amount of flavor disguised in every bite.  Neither one of us is usually a fan of brussels sprouts
column4: but wow- these seemed to literally burst with flavor.  Sweet
column8: we couldn't stop ourselves.  At one point they even served us a roll that appeared to just be a bed of rice topped with avocado slices.  They looked pretty average to both of us
column9: until we tried them.  Where on earth did all this flavor come from?!  Hidden underneath the avocado was a slightly spicy
column10: tangy sauce that left both of us shocked and wanting more.
